text: Allah hacchena mahakasamandali o prthibira aloka. Tamra alokera upama hacche yena ekati kulangi yate ache ekati pradipa. Pradipati rayeche ekati kacera cimanira bhetare. Cimaniti yena ekati ujjbala taraka, yeti jbalano hayeche pabitra jayatuna gacha theke, -- purbancaliya naya, pascatyera'o naya, tara telata yena prajjbalita yadi'o aguna take sparsa karate pare na. Alokera upare aloka! Allah tamra alokera dike yake icche karena patha dekhiye nena. Ara allah manusera jan'ya upamagulo chomrena. Ara allah saba-kichu sanbandhe sarbajnata.
